Second pass of אמר רב יוסף מצוה בו יותר.text: On the second pass, lets consider further questions we might have with this line:

tokens.text: You will improve much more quickly if you read the hints sparingly and try to figure out the answer yourself first.

Hints.text: The Mishnah had an extra word, and R Yosef is coming to suggest that the extra word was included to teach the idea that it is better to do mitzvos yourself.

tokensOfLine.text: any questions regarding this principle that R Yosef is mentioning

Any questions regarding this principle t.text: R Yosef is telling us that even though you can do a mitzvah with a shaliach, it is better to do it yourself.

tokensOfLine.text: Can we think of any questions regarding that?

tokens.text: Can we think of any questions regarding that?
